name: The wasteland
description:
You Are Caleb Jones, one tourist who survived one Ship Crash. You Need to survive in The Wastelands, one island that almost all animals are extinct, and no one is there to help you (or there is?).

Build your base, Gather Resources, Kill zombies and discover all the mysterious things about this island, and of course, get out of there!

[STORYMODE AND MULTIPLAYER NOT INCLUDED ON DEMO]

GAME REQUIREMENTS

Required to play:

Nvidia Geforce GTX 750ti 2GB // AMD HD 7870 2GB

Intel Core i5 2400 Or Equal

6GB RAM

Recommended Specs:

Nvidia Geforce GTX 1070 8GB // AMD VEGA 56

Intel Core i5 9400f // AMD Ryzen 5 2600X

8GB RAM
